trans-unit.source: Represents an error or warning event that occurred during the use of a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter"></xref> or <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示的错误或警告事件的使用过程中发生<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter"></xref>或<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: You typically use MetadataConversionError objects to determine whether classes that extend <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter> have encountered an error or warning condition by checking the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter.Errors%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter.Errors%2A> properties after importing or exporting the metadata.
trans-unit.target: 你通常使用 MetadataConversionError 对象来确定是否可扩展类<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter>和<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter>通过检查遇到错误或警告条件<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter.Errors%2A>和<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter.Errors%2A>后导入或导出元数据属性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter.Errors%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter.Errors%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter>

trans-unit.source: Tools can use these error and warning messages to report metadata import and export problems to the user.
trans-unit.target: 工具可使用这些错误和警告消息来报告元数据导入和导出到用户的问题。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"></xref> class using the specified message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"></xref>类使用指定的消息。

trans-unit.source: By default an error is created.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下会创建一个错误。

trans-unit.source: The error or warning message.
trans-unit.target: 错误或警告消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified message and isWarning value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例类使用指定的消息和 isWarning 值。

trans-unit.source: By default an error is created.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下会创建一个错误。

trans-unit.source: The message for the warning or error.
trans-unit.target: 为警告或错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Whether the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"></xref> is an error or a warning.
trans-unit.target: 是否<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"></xref>为错误还是警告。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether two <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"></xref> objects have value equality.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示两个<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"></xref>对象的值是否相等。

trans-unit.source: For details about reference and value equality, see <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关引用和值的相等性的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>。</xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object with which this object is compared.
trans-unit.target: 与之比较此对象的对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"></xref> objects have value equality; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果两个<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"></xref>对象的值相等; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that serves as a hash function for a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，用作哈希函数<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: For details about hash codes, see <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关哈希代码的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A>。</xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: A value suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures, such as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: 一个适合在哈希算法和数据结构，如哈希表中使用的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"></xref> is a warning or an error.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"></xref>是警告还是错误。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"></xref> is to be considered a warning; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"></xref>将被视为一条警告; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the error or warning message.
trans-unit.target: 获取错误或警告消息。

trans-unit.source: The message for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 有关消息<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"> </xref>。
